entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
